One for each day of October so far. And these are just some of his actions.
13) Downplayed need for action on gun violence after worst mass shooting in American history.
12) Hurt American leadership & national security by trying to end the Iran Deal
11) Insulted Puerto Ricans without power or water, then threatened to abandon them
10) Threatened the free press
9) Decided to stop paying ACA subsidies, which will raise costs for working families
8) Issued executive order to allow more association plans, which will raise healthcare costs for elderly & sick
7) Rolled back protections for LGBT workers, making it legal to fire trans workers just for being trans.
6) Attacked women's health by giving their bosses a veto over their ability to access contraception - which IS healthcare
5) Encouraged Americans to turn on each other w/ recriminations of being unpatriotic by coopting NFL players protesting racial injustice
4)  Let funding for Community Health Centers expire
3) Let CHIP – the program that provides health insurance to low-income children – expire
2) Supported an unconstitutional and unscientific ban on abortion after 20-weeks
1) Sabotaged a deal to let Dreamers stay here by including xenophobic, anti-immigrant demands
